content:
No problem! Here's an updated version of the shift rotation sheet for GM social media agents with 7 agents, 4 shifts, and 2 days off for every agent for only a week:

Shift Rotation Sheet for GM Social Media Agents (1 Week)

|  | 8 am - 4 pm | 12 pm - 8 pm | 4 pm - 12 am | 12 am - 8 am |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Day 1 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 |
| Day 2 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 |
| Day 3 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 |
| Day 4 | Agent 6 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 |
| Day 5 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 | Agent 5 | Agent 6 |
| Day 6 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 | Agent 4 |
| Day 7 | Agent 7 | Agent 1 | Agent 2 | Agent 3 |

Note: This rotation is for a 1-week period, with each agent working one shift per day and having two days off during the week. You can adjust the duration of the rotation and the number of days off per week based on your team's specific needs.
